name: Astrocop (Amstrad)
description:
History: Space Police they said, you will see world they said and that is how you ended up in the Cat Rescue Patrol. You will have to travel through space in search of those lost cats that no one has been able to recover and finally give them the life they deserve.

Game objective: Find the kitten in each level and get the floppy disk with the space / time information of the next kitten. Rescue them all!

FEATURES:

  • Chubby pixels inside
  • 15 levels
  • Difficulty suitable for one-armed
  • Kitten !!!

POWERED BY MK1- PESTECERA ENGINE

MENU SCREEN BY ERIC -TITAN- CUBIZOLLE

TESTING: SR.PATATA  &  HICKS

SPECIAL THANKS TO XENOMORPH FOR THE SUPPORT
